the price with production relation :
x is the quantity of production in tonnes

Potatoes: 
--------
equation if we consider only 2015:
Price:1,550,000-1.34x+0.000000433x^2-0.000000000000621x^3+0.000000000000000000334x^4
from 1991:
price = -7,066 + 0.038x - 0.0000000861x^2 + 0.000000000000109x^3 - 
0.0000000000000000000848x^4 + 0.0000000000000000000000429x^5 - 
0.0000000000000000000000000143x^6 + 0.000000000000000000000000000312x^7 -
0.000000000000000000000000000000428x^8 + 0.0000000000000000000000000000000334x^9 
- 0.00000000000000000000000000000000113x^10

The link :https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1ccd38xmUbQ72-6dW2tzpkMIHfcOItxFsx1ncoAOMG0A/edit?usp=sharing

Tomatoes:
---------
price =-26,463 + 0.312x - 0.00000159x^2 + 0.00000000000458x^3 -
 0.00000000000000000827x^4 + 0.00000000000000000000973x^5 -
 0.000000000000000000000075x^6 + 0.000000000000000000000000369x^7 -
 0.000000000000000000000000000108x^8 + 0.000000000000000000000000000000159x^9 -
 0.00000000000000000000000000000000718x^10

Carrots:
-------

 0.0000000000000481x^4 - 0.0000000000000000000168x^5 +
 0.0000000000000000000000404x^6 - 0.000000000000000000000000655x^7 +
 0.0000000000000000000000000000689x^8 - 0.0000000000000000000000000000000424x^9 +
 0.00000000000000000000000000000000116x^10

Lemon:
------
Price = -1,250,000 + 281x - 0.0272x^2 + 0.0000015x^3 - 0.0000000000524x^4 +
 0.00000000000000122x^5 - 0.0000000000000000000193x^6 +
 0.000000000000000000000000205x^7 - 0.000000000000000000000000000139x^8 +
 0.000000000000000000000000000000551x^9 - 0.00000000000000000000000000000000964x^10

Apple:
------
Price = 27.8 + 0.00448x - 0.0000000245x^2 + 0.000000000000531x^3 
- 0.0000000000000000000378x^4
